title: Early Round Info Dart to C Long From C Spawn
description: Use this dart for early information at C Long, or to set up a play from Garage or C Site.

title: A Site Retake Dart From A Link
description: Here's a simple, yet effective retake dart that clears many key post plant positions.

title: Shockdart to Harass A Site Bomb Planter
description: Use this simple, yet effective Shockdart for the A bomb planter at Default.

title: Right Side B Site To Mid Window Recon Bolt
description: This is a great Recon Bolt for Mid Window that lands quickly, and has an easy setup.

title: A Tower To A Long Reconbolt
description: This is useful for revealing players walking up towards A Site from A Long.

title: C Link To Mid Stairs Reconbolt
description: This is useful for revealing players walking up from Mid Courtyard into B Site, as well as players lurking outside Mid Doors.

title: Defender Side Spawn To A Site Reconbolt
description: This is useful for revealing players under A Tower and the angles within view of the back side of Default.

title: Default Dart From Market to Mail
description: Here's a strong dart you can use to default Mid at the start of the round, as it scans for any Defenders looking to contest for control.

title: B Split Dart For Rafters From B Main
description: When splitting B through Mid and B Main, use this dart to enable your teammates for an easier contest at Heaven.

title: B Lobby To B Site Default Recon Bolt
description: This is useful for revealing players on Default B Site. Make sure to hug the wall behind you when following the lineup.

title: Ramen To Entrance Of Mid Vent Recon Bolt
description: This is useful for revealing players inside of Mid Vent, without players in Mid Vent being able to stop themselves from being revealed, unless they shoot the recon bolt or go into Lower Vents. To do this, stand in the corner seen on screen, hug the wall behind you, follow the lineup exactly as seen on screen, and then shoot a single bounce full charge recon bolt.

title: A Lobby To A Ramps Recon Bolt
description: This is useful for revealing players in most spots in A Ramps, but will not reveal players crouching behind the box on the left side of Ramps going in toward Heaven. To do this, hug the corner seen on-screen, then aim your crosshair at the top right of the billboard in A Main, and shoot a single bounce, full charge bolt.

title: B Heaven Shock to B Default Planter
description: Use this shock dart lineup to harass the bomb planter at Default, they will take its full damage.

title: B Site Retake Dart Back Site From B Heaven
description: When retaking the B Site, use this dart to scan Defenders hiding backsite or Pillar.

title: Lower Mid Vent To Front Mid Bottom Recon Bolt
description: This is useful for scanning players in the Mid Bottom Cubby, and some of Mid Top from Lower Mid Vent.

title: Defender Side Spawn To A Ramp Recon Bolt
description: This lineup is useful for getting information on players pushing up A Ramps, as well as scanning players in much of the inside of A Tower. Don't be careless in setting this up though, since an enemy player could easily peek you while you set the arrow up and pick you off if they have already pushed far enough inside of A Tower.

title: Hut to B Site Tree Execute Dart
description: Use this simple, yet effective Dart to scan the most threatening Defender positions on the B Site. This lineup requires no specific spot to position, aim at the tree, and shoot.

title: Start Round Dart From Tiles to Bottom Mid
description: Here's one of many ways to default Mid on Ascent as Sova, this dart covers the Defender trying to peek Top Mid.

title: Start Round Dart From Cat to Bottom Mid
description: Here's one of many ways to default Mid on Ascent as Sova, use this lineup at the start of the round to gain fast information.

title: A Main to A Site Execute Dart
description: Use this Sova lineup to allow yourself to scale the A Site with your team for a more coordinated execute.

title: Recon Bolt For B Lane / B Site From B Lobby
description: This Recon Bolt scans much of B Lane, a large area of B Site, and much of the B Site Stairs as well. It is a great all around arrow that can not only reveal players, but also limit the movements of players within the arrow's range as well if they want to remain hidden.

title: Shock Bolt For Behind Dice On A Site From A Main
description: This is a simple, but effective lineup to land a shock bolt behind Dice on A Site.

title: Mid Bottom To Defender Side Spawn Recon Bolt
description: This lineup is useful for revealing players behind the wall that separates Mid Lane from Defender Side Spawn, keep in mind though that you need a medium bullet penetration weapon to be able to shoot through the wall that is shot through on-screen.

title: Start Round Aggressive Dart From Stairs to Outside B Main
description: Use this fast dart at the start of the round for early information, or to set up your teammates looking for an aggressive play towards outside B Main.

title: Mid Reclear Dart From Tree
description: Here's a great dart to use to help you fight mid, or update information on Attacker's rotations. This dart clears most of mid, except for fridge and past the mid-arch.

title: Mid Courtyard Support Recon Bolt From B Site Stairs
description: This Recon Bolt is a useful support arrow to help locate players in Mid Courtyard, and part of Mid Link. Be careful when lining this arrow up though, since you do have to expose yourself to B Main to set it up.

title: A Site Support Recon Bolt From B Site
description: This Recon Bolt is a useful support arrow to help your teammates on A Site either hold the Site, or retake the Site depending on the circumstances in the round. This is best used however, when you are rotating from B Lane to Defender Spawn, so that you can rotate from there to retake or defend A Site.

title: Shockbolt For A Site Default Spike Plant From A Rafters
description: This is a simple, but effective lineup to land a shock bolt on the A Site Default Spike plant spot on the front side of Generator. This may potentially delay the Spike plant as well, but the main goal of this lineup is to do damage, and potentially pick up a lucky pick if the player planting the Spike is low on HP.

title: Quick B Main Recon Bolt From Close B Defender Spawn
description: This is a quick and simple Recon Bolt to scan the front side of B Main, that is often used toward the beginning of the round. The arrow is useful for gathering information on the front side of B Main without having to play on-site to do so, either as a change up for your default setup on site, or to best adapt to the circumstances in the round.

title: Front A Site Cannon Retake Recon Bolt
description: This Recon Bolt lands on the front right tip of a cannon pointing up in the air on the front side of A Site. Landing the arrow on the right corner of the tip of this cannon can be useful when retaking A Site, since the arrow will scan the entire front side of A Site, and behind the right side of Generator.

title: Aggressive Yellow Control Dart From Garage
description: Use this dart to effectively contest for Yellow control, it scans all of the Defender positions there and a good portion of the B Site.

title: Default Info Dart for Crane From B Long
description: Here's a simple, yet effective dart lineup that scans any Defender contesting for B Long control.

title: Start Round Default Dart for Top Belt
description: This lineup is not specific, you simply shoot the arrow in the general area to gain early round information on any Defenders looking to take an aggressive engagement.

title: B Green to B Site Shock Bolt
description: This is a good set of shock darts for post plant on B Site.
